author: Adam K. Raymond
title: Social Distancing Enforcement Drones Arrive in the U.S.
description: Cities in New Jersey and Florida are using drones to encourage people to disperse, go home, and stay there.
content: In late January, a viral video from China showed people whod wandered outside in the early days of the coronavirus outbreak getting scolded by a disembodied voice from a drone flying overhead. Last month, similar campaigns began in France, where locals flouti… [+2356 chars]
